Room.Name: Zelda's Capes and Fine Furs
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a shop that sells the latest fashions in capes and furs.
Room.LongDescription: Although the windows show the latest fads in capes and other finery, the owner knows that she can make money on the old standbys too. Near the back of the shop you can find old favorites that never go out of style.
